titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on 5-amino-N-(2-hydroxyethyl)-2,3-xylenesulfonamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/26/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on 5-amino-N-(2-hydroxyethyl)-2,3-xylenesulfonamide.
